data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Mandatory Follow-Up Lock. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

requestBody.title: Customer uses advanced payment instruments API Trace

data.title: Customer uses advanced payment instruments API Trace

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: ""Returns [date]" messaging (not "no availability")". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.
